General.Name: Epoxy Base Electronic Material Corp Ltd
General.Description: Epoxy Base Electronic Material Corporation Limited produces and sells electronic grade epoxy resins in China and internationally. The company offers wind blade and liquid type epoxy resins, and specialized and modified type epoxy resins, as well as specialized resins for copper clad laminate, powder coating, and can coating. It also provides professional technical after-sale services. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Epoxy Base Electronic Material Corp. and changed its name to Epoxy Base Electronic Material Corporation Limited in March 2008. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
